word:
MR No. 1464 - The Work in Mount Vincent and Hamilton; Joshua, the High Priest, Represents the Church

     (Written May 4, 1900, from Maitland, Australia, to Edson and Emma White.) 


     W. C. W., Sara, and your mother left Cooranbong for Maitland about ten o'clock A.M. There had been some rain, and we thought we might get more; so we went nicely prepared for it. We had our two-seated surrey and two strong, faithful horses that could take us up the hills and over [to] Mount Vincent.
